# Elation (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] \[[[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Bard Spells|Bard 2]], [[2nd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 2]], Emissary of Barachiel 2, [[Joy (Domain)|Joy 2]], [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 3]], [[BoXM 6th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** 80 ft.

**Targets:** Allies in an 80-ft.-radius spread of you

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Book of Exalted Deeds (WotC), pg. 97

Your allies become elated, full of energy and joy. Affected creatures gain a +2 morale bonus to effective Strength and Dexterity, and their speed increases by +5 feet.

*Elation* does not remove the condition of fatigue, but it does offset most of the penalties for being [[Fatigued|fatigued]].
